description.en:
The QOOBER project is a new generation payment system that combines:

- Own blockchain with high bandwidth and low fees
- Support of Paramining mechanism – an improved version of POS mining with a unique technology for assigning referral links
- Limited issue of coins
- Lack of influence of the development team on the QOOB coin 
- Fully decentralized project management with Nodes distributed around the world
- Open source, focused on creating add-ons and applications by third-party developers

The QOOB cryptocurrency is designed to bring blockchain technologies and the field of international e-Commerce to a new level of interaction.
